info.institution: Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Texas at Austin
info.summary:
Srujana Merugu works as a Ph.D. student in Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Texas at Austin, and his\her h-index is 17, g-index is 45. His\Her interests are :
 Data Mining; Bregman Divergence; Generative Model; Data Privacy; Exponential Family;
